Author: lmaokillmee
Text: Well I don't know exactly if your mom knows about your ED or not... but my mom would 100% react the same way. I actually told her about eating disorders because I knew that she would not care. My mom thinks that eating disorders are in general good, until you start to "look like a monkey" (she calls very skinny people monkeys)  TW: diets and calories   If I told her I'm planning on eating 1200 kcal that day, she would tell me "no don't do that, 900 should be a lot already". Or if I'm eating chips she will say "just 3 chips should be enough". I've been (literally) obese almost my whole life so I understand her concerns. Any weight loss from me in any method would make her very happy. (Too bad I almost only binge or high restrict so no weight loss from me ðŸ™ƒ)  Anyways, perhaps your mom is the same way..?
